name: Approval

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Returns true if the record with the ID id is locked, or false if it’s not.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Returns a map of record IDs and their lock statuses. If the record is locked the status is true. If the record is not locked the status is false.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Returns true if the sobject record is locked, or false if it’s not.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.description: Returns a map of record IDs to lock statuses. If the record is locked the status is true. If the record is not locked the status is false.

methods.name: lock
methods.description: Locks an object, and returns the lock results.
